item.description:
Election Day Mixer



Don’t miss out on the upscale event of the year for law students, attorneys and all professionals in the Hartford area! The Northeast Black Law Students Association (NEBLSA) and One Events present an Election day event you will not forget! Hear the sounds of Busta Rhyme’s own DJ, DJ Scratchator while watching the election results roll in on the big screen. VIP rooms are also available which include food, bottles of champagne , and your own cocktail waitress! Purchase your tickets now as they will sell out!

Purchase tickets online at: http://www.acteva.com...



Date: Tuesday, November 4, 2008

Time: 9:00 PM – 2:00 AM

Location: Cloud 9

7 Congress Street

Downtown, Hartford, CT

Admission: $15 in advance (10/10/08 – 10/31/08); $20 (11/1/08 – 11/3/08)

$22 at the door before 11 PM; $25 after 11 PM

Attire: Professional, Classy and Upscale

Contact: Kriss Fuller at neattorneygeneral@gmail.com or 860-982-5087

Dyshann Anderson at dyshann@gmail.com or 860-794-6934

1 VIP Room with overhead projector, 3VIP Sections overseeing the dance floor available. Inquiries may be sent to neattorneygeneral@gmail.com. To schedule a tour of the venue, please contact Dyshann Anderson at dyshann@gmail.com or 860-794-6934.



One Events ©2008

By Dyshann Anderson
item.name: Election Day Mixer
